Civic Engagement During COVID-19 (Part 1) 🏛

Aug 30, 2020

  • civictech
  • episode
  • govtech
  • civic engagement
  • government
  • covid-19

This is the first of two episodes where we’ll talk to folks who are leading organizations trying to make civic involvement easier despite the constraints of COVID-19. For this one, we’re joined by Bhavini Patel to chat with us about their platform Be the Change which seeks to facilitate connections between constituents and state legislators.
